EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.SmartIPNet.none.N.G.N.14705.Smart IP Nurture campaign.Email 02
EmailTemplate.subject: Video: You can still catch IP Networks Reimagined
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Video: You can still catch IP Networks Reimagined Every great idea has its time. That’s why there’s the FP4. On June 14, 2017, Nokia made technology history by launching exciting innovations in IP networking via 360° livestream video.
The good news is you can still view the video on demand.
In the video replay, join Basil Alwan, President, IP/Optical Networks Business Group at Nokia as he shares Nokia’s strategy on the evolution of IP networks, including cloud-scale routing and the introduction of the world’s first multi-terabit network processor – the FP4.
Discover how the FP4 and Nokia innovations are driving the Modern IP network to change networking forever. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
